alert.note: Alert for Calaveras; Stanislaus (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 3:09PM PST until March 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Stanislaus County in central California... Southwestern Calaveras County in northern California... * Until 400 PM PST. * At 308 PM PST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Copper Cove Village, or 13 miles west of Sonora, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Telegraph City, Angels City, Eugene, Milton, Hodson, Copperopolis, Copper Cove Village, Vallecito, East Oakdale and Angels Camp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
